name: Runner 2D
description:
This game is made for Android and was built on a Samsung S8 please leave a comment if you have problems with your aspect ratio and/or resolution. 

This was one of my first games and there's only one level. 

This game was just a test to learn how to 2D :)

I'm aware there are many problems with this game such as, the hit detection with coins, the enemy AI, and the coin sound is messed up on the WebGL build. The WebGL version and the Windows version where made in like an hour so sorry if there scuffed. Anyway I hope you can still enjoy this little demo of my first 2D game.

Art is not mine and was downloaded from the unity asset store:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349
